com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.traffic

Class TrafficPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.traffic.TrafficPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.OnMapChangedListener

    public final class TrafficPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.OnMapChangedListener
    The Traffic Plugin allows you to add Mapbox Traffic v1 to the Mapbox Android SDK.

    Initialise this plugin in the OnMapReadyCallback.onMapReady(MapboxMap) and provide a valid instance of MapView and MapboxMap.

    Use setVisibility(boolean) to switch state of this plugin to enable or disabled. Use isVisible() to validate if the plugin is active or not.

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Returns true if the traffic plugin is currently enabled.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, false otherwise

      • setVisibility

        public void setVisibility(boolean visible)
        Toggles the visibility of the traffic layers.
        Parameters:
        visible - true for visible, false for none

      • onMapChanged

        public void onMapChanged(int change)
        Called when a map change events occurs.

        Used to detect loading of a new style, if applicable reapply traffic source and layers.

        Specified by:
        onMapChanged in interface com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView.OnMapChangedListener
        Parameters:
        change - the map change event that occurred
